Transaction: Agreed to terms with D Viktor Svedberg on a two-year contract extension through the 2017-18 season.
Assigned D Garrett Noonan from Milwaukee (AHL) to Cincinnati (ECHL).
Assigned D Tyler Wotherspoon to Stockton (AHL).
Assigned F Anton Zlobin from Wilkes-Barre/Scranton (AHL) to Wheeling (ECHL).
Assigned F Erik Karlsson from Charlotte (AHL) to Florida (ECHL).
Assigned G Mackenzie Skapski from Hartford (AHL) to Greenville (ECHL).
Assigned G Marek Langhamer to Springfield (AHL).
Reassigned F Brendan Woods to Charlotte (AHL).
Recalled C Brody Sutter from Charlotte (AHL).
Recalled D Josh Brown from Manchester (ECHL) to Portland (AHL).
Recalled D Trevor Carrick from Charlotte (AHL).
Recalled F Kenny Agostino from Stockton (AHL) on an emergency basis.
Recalled LW Anthony Mantha from Grand Rapids (AHL).
Signed D Dan Renouf to a two-year, entry-level contract and assigned him to Grand Rapids (AHL).
